publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2784 Johann Lamont: International Women's Day - 8 March 2002â€”That the Parliament notes that 8 March 2002 is International Women's Day; congratulates the Women Together group in the Pollok constituency and women across Scotland and around the world who are organising events to celebrate the work of women past, present and future; recognises the central role of women in our communities in meeting needs today and creating change for tomorrow and beyond, and urges the Scottish Executive and the Parliament's committees, in partnership with women's organisations, to examine how women's needs and rights might more effectively be addressed across the range of services, departments and organisations that impact on women's lives. Supported by: Sarah Boyack*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Brian Fitzpatrick*
S1M-2784 International Women's Day - 8 March 2002 (lodged on 26 February 2002) Marilyn Livingstone*, Mr George Reid*, Karen Whitefield*
S1M-2784 International Women's Day - 8 March 2002 (lodged on 26 February 2002) Alex Neil*, Maureen Macmillan*

S1M-2784 Johann Lamont: International Women's Day - 8 March 2002-That the Parliament notes that 8 March 2002 is International Women's Day; congratulates the Women Together group in the Pollok constituency and women across Scotland and around the world who are organising events to celebrate the work of women past, present and future; recognises the central role of women in our communities in meeting needs today and creating change for tomorrow and beyond, and urges the Scottish Executive and the Parliament's committees, in partnership with women's organisations, to examine how women's needs and rights might more effectively be addressed across the range of services, departments and organisations that impact on women's lives. Supported by: Sarah Boyack, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Brian Fitzpatrick, Marilyn Livingstone, Mr George Reid, Karen Whitefield, Alex Neil, Maureen Macmillan, Michael Russell*
S1M-2784 International Women's Day - 8 March 2002 (lodged on 26 February 2002) Elaine Smith*, Donald Gorrie*, Margaret Smith*
S1M-2784 International Women's Day - 8 March 2002 (lodged on 26 February 2002) Linda Fabiani*, Christine Grahame*, Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-2784 International Women's Day - 8 March 2002 (lodged on 26 February 2002) Trish Godman*, Tommy Sheridan*
